content.raw: Well..., this turned out into a much bigger ordeal than I thought. It's probably turning into a couple of other pull requests. First, I wasn't creating a component for the `thread_pitch` so it wasn't getting passed along to the physics engine. But then I  looked at osrf/Gazebo and found out Dart and Gazebo have a different interpretation of `thread_pitch` so we need a change in ign-physics. Also, there is a bug in my sdf dom update for `thread_pitch`. :cry:
